channel.title: Perspective through the lense of Lotta Moberg, PhD, CFA
channel.description: My research and analysis synthesizes global economics, politics, and policy as a macroeconomic analyst at the Dynamic Allocations Strategies team at William Blair.

item.title: Cited in BBC Vietnamese
item.description: I explain the often underappreciated political economy aspects of special economic zones.
item.author: lotta@lottamoberg.com (Lotta Moberg, PhD, CFA)

item.title: Cited in the Yale Daily News
item.description: I explain the main pitfalls of opportunity zones.

item.title: My Talk at the Chapman Symposium on Special Jurisdictions
item.description: I discuss the negative and positive conseqeuence of special economic zones.
